T02TD2101E:131a-1: sa m'a dhi buddha bi sha g'a ta bo dhi d'i pam n'a ma /
T02TD2101E:131a-3: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel bar byed pa'i mar me zhes bya ba /
T02TD2101E:131a-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2101E:131a-5: gang gis dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la //
T02TD2101E:131a-6: yun ring btud pa'i mthu ni gzi brjid ldan //
T02TD2101E:131a-7: gang zhig rgyud la btsan thabs 'jug byad pa //
T02TD2101E:131a-8: shes rab mig dang mi ldan nyam ngar rgyug / gdung ba gcod byed rgyu ni sems pa'i shes rab ste //
T02TD2101E:131a-9: thams cad theg chen lam du 'jug pa'i rigs //
T02TD2101E:131a-10: rab tu byed pa'i lam du ma zhugs pa'i /
T02TD2101E:131a-13: // / bsam gtan pa ni nags klung bung ba bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131a-14: rig pa'i gnas lnga rgal te tshar gcod gang //
T02TD2101E:131a-15: gzhung lugs mi ldan pas ni don ma rnyed //
T02TD2101E:131a-16: tshogs rgyas pa yis rab tu nga rgyal ba //
T02TD2101E:131a-17: rgyal po'i sgo ba bzhin du bde blag bral //
T02TD2101E:131a-18: ye shes drug gi yul la ma zhugs na //
T02TD2101E:131a-19: yid ni ngang tshul ngan pas rgya cher min //
T02TD2101E:131a-20: rtogs dang nyams su myong ba'i mtha' bral bas //
T02TD2101E:131a-21: brten dang goms pa ma rnyed ta la 'dra //
T02TD2101E:131a-22: chos rnams rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2101E:131a-23: gsar la rtsis bsgyur rgyan du byas pa bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131a-24: gang zhig 'brel med ting 'dzin gang bsgom pa //
T02TD2101E:131a-25: thams cad mkhyen par mi rung sangs rgyas min //
T02TD2101E:131a-26: bskyed pa'i rim la gnas na rdzogs rim mchog / de yang snying po sbyangs nas gcig 'gyur ba //
T02TD2101E:131a-27: rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bde chen de //
T02TD2101E:131a-28: yid bzhin nor bu gtsug tu btags pa bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131a-29: bskyed pa'i rim pa gces spras mdzod 'dzin na //
T02TD2101E:131a-30: lha yi bag chags nyid kyis grol mi 'gyur //
T02TD2101E:131a-31: de bzhin nang dang zab mo'ang de yin te //
T02TD2101E:131a-32: glang chen mig srung zug rngur gyur pa bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131a-33: ldog pa gcod la chos rnams brgyad khrir bden //
T02TD2101E:131a-34: de phyir rigs dang ye shes bde gshegs gsung //
T02TD2101E:131a-35: rang bzhin shes na gar yang bde ba med //
T02TD2101E:131a-36: mi bden med phyir kun mkhyen tshig gis dbul //
T02TD2101E:131a-37: de ltar bya ba'i rim pa zhes pa ni //
T02TD2101E:131a-38: ka shi wa rnams mu tig rnyed pa bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131a-39: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba che la gnas //
T02TD2101E:131a-40: go cig 'dres shing 'dus pas mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD2101E:131a-41: gcig la bstod pas thams cad bstod 'gyur ba //
T02TD2101E:131a-42: ye shes sems dpa' brjod pa thugs mthun yin //
T02TD2101E:131b-0: 'khor dang myang @131b 'das chos su ci snang dang //
T02TD2101E:131b-1: sna tshogs 'bru dang sna tshogs byed pa dang //
T02TD2101E:131b-2: so so'i rgyud la bden par snang mod kyang //
T02TD2101E:131b-3: ye shes sems dpa'i sprul pa nor bu bzhin //
T02TD2101E:131b-4: 'od kyang kun rdzob tsam du thams cad yod //
T02TD2101E:131b-5: gsung dag pa la brten nas 'phags pa mthong //
T02TD2101E:131b-6: yid 'ong de ni dge ba'i las las byung //
T02TD2101E:131b-7: sdug bsngal mi bsten phyir na spang bas bya //
T02TD2101E:131b-8: de phyir gsang sngags rten 'brel 'byung ba yi //
T02TD2101E:131b-9: man ngag rgya mtsho'i gnas ni rin chen brgyud //
T02TD2101E:131b-10: 'di las 'byung bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
T02TD2101E:131b-11: skas kyi rim pa bzhin du rim par bgrod //
T02TD2101E:131b-12: ma rig dang bcas shes pa 'di yis ni//
T02TD2101E:131b-13: go bar mi rigs zhen pa'i mthu las byung //
T02TD2101E:131b-14: mi gnas snying po rgyud las skyes pas na //
T02TD2101E:131b-15: 'khrul par mi rigs gdod ma'i mthu las byung //
T02TD2101E:131b-16: rang bzhin rtag cing mi 'gyur rtag pa nyid //
T02TD2101E:131b-17: dri ldan nges shes rang rig rgyud las byung //
T02TD2101E:131b-18: rang bzhin rgyud la ji ltar yang gnas pa //
T02TD2101E:131b-19: bsam par mi nus aa ma ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2101E:131b-20: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel ba'i mar me zhes bya ba //
T02TD2101E:131b-21: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2101E:131b-23: // / rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
